plot: Talkshow host Menno Dekker may be known as a Casanova, but nothing could be further from the truth. His situation is not about to be remedied when his artistic uncle Adriaan arrives to stay.
title: De verlegen versierder
plot_es: Talkshow host Menno Dekker may be known as a Casanova, but nothing could be further from the truth. His situation is not about to be remedied when his artistic uncle Adriaan arrives to stay.
plot_en: Talkshow host Menno Dekker may be known as a Casanova, but nothing could be further from the truth. His situation is not about to be remedied when his artistic uncle Adriaan arrives to stay.
